item.title: Save Post - WordPress Plugin Development - CodeTab
item.description: 7.3.Â WordPress Save Post In the previous two blogs, we saw how to add custom post type and customize post editor. In this blog, we cover the steps to save the custom post and its meta data. We added sos custom post type as use it as social lockers. Sos Lockers defines four meta data fields. One of benefits of WordPress Custom Post Type is that we can use WordPress Post management framework to handle activities such as publish, trash and edit.
